transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 pivot(groupBy(year),
	pivotBy(genres),
	rating_total = sum(toInteger(Rating)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 derive(rating_totalnull = toLong(byName('rating_totalnull')),
		{rating_total(no genres listed)} = toLong(byName('rating_total(no genres listed)')),
